<!-- Code generated by generrordocs.go; DO NOT EDIT. -->

```
JumpIntoBlock occurs when a forward jump goes to a label inside a nested
block.

Example:
 func f(x int) {
 	goto L
 	if x > 0 {
 	L:
 		print("inside block")
 	}
}
```
